vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
Demo.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenAddress.call(transferFromSig,from,_tos[i],values[i])) (patch_12.sol#15)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Demo.transfer (patch_12.sol#4-18):
	-require(bool)(tokenAddress.call(transferFromSig,from,_tos[i],values[i])) patch_12.sol#15

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_tos' of Demo.transfer (patch_12.sol#7) is not in mixedCase
